thread.title: Richards TV & Appliance Inc.
thread.title_full: www.iElectrica.com reviewed by Richards TV & Appliance Inc.

author: Richards TV & Appliance Inc.
title: Richards TV & Appliance Inc.
text: ordered 86 in LG SUHD 4k tv form iElectrica. When it arrived it was damaged. iElectrica went out of there way to get us a replacement as soon as possible. Very good communication. I also purchased very high end LG oled 65 in and it was a flawless transaction. Very smooth and quick. Thank-you very much will do more business with you in the future.
